Case# NSDrawer.State.openState

macOS 10.0–10.13Deprecated

```
case openState
```

Deprecated

Drawers are deprecated; consider using NSSplitViewController

## [Discussion](/documentation/appkit/nsdrawer/state-swift.enum/openstate#Discussion)

The drawer is open (visible onscreen).
